resources.string: Most websites will still work properly even when this content is blocked.
Firefox Beta has blocked content that isn\'t secure.
Importing bookmarks and history from Android
Allow Mozilla to contact me about this report
Exit without sending a crash report?
Add a comment (comments are publicly visible)
Include the address of the page I was on
Firefox Beta had a problem and crashed. Your tabs should be listed on the Firefox Beta Start page when you restart.
Tell Mozilla about this crash so they can fix it
Firefox Beta submits crash reports to help Mozilla make your browser more stable and secure
Shares data with Mozilla about your browser health and helps you understand your browser performance
To improve your experience, Firefox Beta automatically sends some information to Mozilla.
To improve your experience, Firefox Beta…
Firefox Beta stats & data: Choose what information to share
Shares performance, usage, hardware and customization data about your browser with Mozilla to help us make Firefox Beta better
Help improve geolocation services for the Open Web by letting Firefox Beta collect and send anonymous cellular tower data
Don\'t forget to set up port forwarding!
An error occurred when trying to load files required to run Firefox Beta
The browsing data from this session will be deleted.
Bookmarks you save show up here.
Your recent tabs show up here.
Open all tabs from last time
Websites you visited most recently show up here.
Articles you save for later show up here.
TIP: Save articles to your reading list by long pressing the %I icon when it appears in the title bar.
TIP: Save articles to your reading list by long pressing the reader mode button when it appears in the title bar.
This page is displaying content that isn\'t secure.

The person using it will not be able to see any of your personal browsing data (like saved passwords, history or bookmarks).\n\nWhen your guest is done, their browsing data will be deleted and your session will be restored.
There is not enough space available for Firefox Beta to start.
Tell sites that I want to be tracked
Tell sites that I do not want to be tracked
Do not tell sites anything about my tracking preferences

The quick orange fox jumps over your expectations with more speed, more flexibility and more security. As a non-profit, we\'re free to innovate on your behalf without any pressure to compromise. That means a better experience for you and a brighter future for the Web.
Don\'t restore after quitting Firefox Beta
You can\'t remove or disable your last search engine.
TIP: Add any website to your list of search providers by long-pressing on its search field.

Recovery Key incorrect. Please try again.
Only one Firefox Sync account is supported.
Link another device to your Sync account
Enter your Firefox Sync account information
Select “Pair a Device” in the Sync section of your other device\'s Firefox options.
Firefox Sync could not connect to the server. Would you like to try again?
Account creation on your device failed.
Do you have more than one Firefox installed? Currently, Firefox Sync only supports one Firefox installation at a time. Please uninstall other instances to use Sync.
Enter this code on your other device
Your Firefox Sync account is already set up. You can go to Settings to manage your account, or launch Firefox Beta.
To activate your new device, select “Set up Sync” on the device, and then select “I Have an Account.”
Your data is now being downloaded in the background. You can go to Settings to manage your account, or start browsing with Firefox Beta.
Set up Firefox Sync on your device to send tabs to other devices.
There was a problem sending your tab.
Set up Sync to send tabs
